name: PANTHEON (itch) (7thArtificer)
description:
Alien machines have invaded the planet Pantheon. Clear them out.

This game is such a long-time-coming. I started it back in like 2017 or something. Back then it was a totally different idea, way too ambitious. So after years of starting and stopping, a few different iterations, I've finally settled on this. A very simple FPS Platformer. I'm honestly just happy to finally finish it.

Hope You Enjoy!

Controls:

Movement = WASD

Jump = SPACE

Shoot = LMB

Pause = TAB
